about_the_game:
Gregor's Notebook is an action game played in a top-down perspective. Players fight against the demon army that rules the dark world using their special powers.

For many years, the demon army had plunged all universes into darkness. Known as the Black Army, this demonic force burned down every place where humanity lived and all the cultures they built with flames of devastating intensity. However, while hunting in the forest, Gregor heard a voice and ran towards it, becoming a beacon of hope in this darkness.

Gregor ran towards a voice coming from a cave and discovered a portal. He entered the portal and was teleported to the elf realm, which had also suffered from the disaster. Not wanting this catastrophe to happen in his own world, Gregor teamed up with an elf princess to seal the portal. This trapped the Black Army in the elf realm, and Gregor decided to fight to save this dark world.

Gregor's Notebook prepares players to fight against the most dangerous enemies of the dark world by offering them special powers, weapons, and abilities. Players will progress through Gregor's story by battling foes, passing levels, and facing challenging bosses.

name: Gregor's Notebook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64-bit (latest service pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or AMD FX 8100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD RAdeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670K or AMD R3 1300X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: The game offers players an exciting gaming experience with its rich graphics, impressive music, and immersive storyline. Gregor's Notebook is the story of a brave hero who saves the dark world, and players will follow in his footsteps as they play.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish*, Greek
*languages with full audio support
